organization.address: 7373 S Lovers Lane Rd, Franklin, Wisconsin 53132

publishedBibles.derived: From the original Hebrew, Aramaic, and Greek

translations.name: The Inclusive Bible
translations.description: The Inclusive Bible is an inclusive-language translation of the Old and New Testaments published in 2007. It replaces gender specific language with gender-neutral language. Not merely content to replace male pronouns, the translators reworked passages that can be construed as pertaining to men only. For example, “gird up your loins” has been replaced with “tighten your belt.”

translations.name: Sheed & Ward
translations.description_short: Sheed & Ward was founded in London, 1926 by Catholic activists Frank Sheed and Maisie Ward
